Read full topic

item.title: A Weird Folder Thing
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:9, topic:160061”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=217858.msg1906230#msg1906230 date=1196414025]
0/10

I can’t say it any better than how it has already been said. It’s shit. I can see some effort put into it. But it still looks like Horse Shit. If you changed the gradient on the folder to match the contents, that would help. And either getting rid of the text altogether or changing the font color, and the layer style. I mean even a shadow would look better than glow. I’d also make the folder’s corners more smooth. And possibly show the other half of the folder as well.
[/quote]

God, you give the best C&C.[/quote]

Why do you say that?

Read full topic
